author: domotheus
content: Random question: Do consensus layer upgrades go through the EIP process at all? Looking at github specs, there's no EIPs or anything, just issues and pull requests updating the executable spec. it seems only the execution layer gets EIPs. Like will there be an EIP number for danksharding?
